numTransPoints1: Number of Points in Gap Direction
numTransPoints2: Number of Points in Transverse Direction

cutAxis: Direction perpendicular to cross-section of interest
edge: Index of base shape edge to bevel, relative to the view axis

beamAxis: The beam will travel along this axis, used when exporting fields
heightAxis: Height is measured along this axis. For undulators the gap is usually defined in this direction
widthAxis: Width is measured along this axis

gapOffset: Additional offset away from the beam along the height axis

phaseCount: The magnetization of each successive magnet is rotated by 2π/n about the beam direction

gapOffset: Additional offset of magnets away from the beam along the height axis
